title: Online Project-Based Design Education for African Workforce

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Large-scale course operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments for time-constrained working professionals, focusing on self-efficacy improvement through region-specific (Africa) problem-solving projects

learning_goals: Learners can independently execute design projects addressing local issues within six months.
Learners improve their ability to creatively and collaboratively solve problems arising during the design process.
Learners participate in at least two extracurricular design activities within three months after training completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
